mapper.sql: wh.PID, wh.bank_id, wh.account_id, wh.transfered_time, wh.audit_time, wh.apply_time, wh.audit_status, wh.amount, wh.cost, wh.wit_sure_desc, wh.fee, wh.bank_type, wh.user_id, (select su.`name` from t_sys_user su where su.PID = wh.user_id) userName, wh.transfered_user_id, (select su.`name` from t_sys_user su where su.PID = wh.transfered_user_id) transferedUserName, wh.STATUS, wh.create_user, wh.create_time, wh.last_update_user, wh.last_update_time, wh.wit_desc, wh.cust_wit_desc, cust.pid customer_id, cust.customer_name, cust.sname, cust.phone_no, bk.bankcard_no, bk.belonging_bank, bk.open_address

t.PID, t.bank_id, t.account_id, t.transfered_time, t.audit_time, t.apply_time, t.audit_status, t.amount, t.cost, t.wit_sure_desc, t.fee, t.bank_type, t.user_id, t.transfered_user_id, t.STATUS, t.create_user, t.create_time, t.last_update_user, t.last_update_time, t.wit_desc, t.cust_wit_desc, t.customer_name, t.sname, t.phone_no, t.bankcard_no, t.belonging_bank, t.open_address
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_biz_withdraw wh LEFT JOIN t_cust_customer cust ON wh.customer_id = cust.pid LEFT JOIN t_cust_bank bk ON wh.bank_id = bk.PID WHERE wh.status >= 0
AND customer_name like concat('%',#{parasMap.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND cust.sname like concat('%',#{parasMap.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND phone_No like concat('%',#{parasMap.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND wh.audit_status = #{parasMap.auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DATE_FORMAT(wh.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{parasMap.applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND wh.audit_status in (1,3)
AND wh.audit_status = (2)
AND wh.audit_status in (4,5)
ORDER BY wh.apply_time DESC

select
from ( select , (@rown := @rown + 1) rowns from (
SELECT
FROM t_biz_withdraw wh LEFT JOIN t_cust_customer cust ON wh.customer_id = cust.pid LEFT JOIN t_cust_bank bk ON wh.bank_id = bk.PID WHERE wh.status >= 0
AND customer_name like concat('%',#{parasMap.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND cust.sname like concat('%',#{parasMap.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND phone_No like concat('%',#{parasMap.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND wh.audit_status = #{parasMap.auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DATE_FORMAT(wh.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{parasMap.applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND wh.audit_status in (1,3)
AND wh.audit_status = (2)
AND wh.audit_status in (4,5)
ORDER BY wh.audit_time DESC
)t, (SELECT @rown := 0) b ) t where 1=1

if.test: expm.exportSet == 2 and expm.startCheckpage != null and expm.endCheckpage != null
expm.exportSet == 3 and expm.startCheckrecords != null and expm.endCheckrecords != null

mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(wh.amount) AS "amount", SUM(wh.cost) AS "cost", SUM(wh.fee) AS "fee" FROM t_biz_withdraw wh LEFT JOIN t_cust_customer cust ON wh.customer_id = cust.pid LEFT JOIN t_cust_bank bk ON wh.bank_id = bk.PID WHERE wh.status >= 0
AND customer_name like concat('%',#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND cust.sname like concat('%',#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND phone_No like concat('%',#{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND wh.audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DATE_FORMAT(wh.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND wh.audit_status in (1,3)
AND wh.audit_status = 2
AND wh.audit_status in (4,5)

select
from t_biz_withdraw wh left join t_cust_customer cust on wh.customer_id = cust.pid left join t_cust_bank bk on wh.bank_id = bk.PID where 1 = 1 and wh.status >= 0
and cust.account_no like concat('%',#{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.sname like concat('%',#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.phone_No like concat('%',#{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and wh.audit_status like concat('%',#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
order by wh.audit_time desc
SELECT count(1) FROM t_biz_withdraw w WHERE w.audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_biz_withdraw wh left join t_cust_customer cust on wh.customer_id = cust.pid left join t_cust_bank bk on wh.bank_id = bk.PID where wh.PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_biz_withdraw
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfered_time = #{transferedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_Status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bank_type = #{bankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wit_desc = #{witDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
